<augment_code_snippet path="README_EN.md" mode="EDIT">
```markdown
# SPEC-mcp

> By DJJ & Danniel
> 
[中文版本](README.md) | English Version

Mimicking `kiro`'s `SPEC` pattern, following the workflow: Requirements -> Design -> Attention -> TODO -> Implementation

## Usage

### Add MCP Server

```json
{
 "mcpServers": {
 "spec-mcp": {
 "command": "uvx",
 "args": [
 "mcp-spec@latest"
 ]
 }
 }
}
```

### Generate Specification Documents

For example, input:

> The key is the last sentence: `call generate_spec`
```text
A web application focused on emotion recording and healing experience, helping users improve mental health and self-awareness through daily mood tracking, diary writing, and data analysis.
Users can record daily mood states, write diaries, upload multimedia content, and understand their emotional change trends through visual data analysis.
The goal is to provide users with a warm and safe digital space to promote emotional management and psychological healing.
MVP doesn't need login/registration features

call generate_spec
```

### Get Specification Documents

```text
call get_spec
```

## Local Development

```bash
git clone https://github.com/TokenRollAI/SPEC-mcp.git

cd SPEC-mcp

uv sync
```
```
</augment_code_snippet>

现在更新中文版README，添加英文版本的链接：

<augment_code_snippet path="README.md" mode="EDIT">

> By DJJ & Danniel
> 
中文版本 | [English Version](README_EN.md)

模仿`kiro`的`SPEC`模式, 按照 需求 -> 设计 -> 注意事项 -> TODO -> 实现
```
</augment_code_snippet>

我已经为你创建了英文版本的README (`README_EN.md`)，并在两个版本之间添加了相互链接。英文版本保持了与中文版本相同的结构和内容，只是翻译成了英文。

# SPEC-mcp

> By DJJ & Danniel
> 
[中文版本](README.md) | English Version

Mimicking `kiro`'s `SPEC` pattern, following the workflow: Requirements -> Design -> Attention -> TODO -> Implementation

## Usage

### Add MCP Server

```json
{
 "mcpServers": {
 "spec-mcp": {
 "command": "uvx",
 "args": [
 "mcp-spec@latest"
 ]
 }
 }
}
```

### Generate Specification Documents

For example, input:

> The key is the last sentence: `call generate_spec`
```text
A web application focused on emotion recording and healing experience, helping users improve mental health and self-awareness through daily mood tracking, diary writing, and data analysis.
Users can record daily mood states, write diaries, upload multimedia content, and understand their emotional change trends through visual data analysis.
The goal is to provide users with a warm and safe digital space to promote emotional management and psychological healing.
MVP doesn't need login/registration features

call generate_spec
```

### Get Specification Documents

```text
call get_spec
```

## Local Development

```bash
git clone https://github.com/TokenRollAI/SPEC-mcp.git

cd SPEC-mcp

uv sync
```
````

# SPEC-mcp

> By DJJ & Danniel
> 
[中文版本](README.md) | English Version

Mimicking `kiro`'s `SPEC` pattern, following the workflow: Requirements -> Design -> Attention -> TODO -> Implementation

## Usage

### Add MCP Server

```json
{
 "mcpServers": {
 "spec-mcp": {
 "command": "uvx",
 "args": [
 "mcp-spec@latest"
 ]
 }
 }
}
```

### Generate Specification Documents

For example, input:

> The key is the last sentence: `call generate_spec`
```text
A web application focused on emotion recording and healing experience, helping users improve mental health and self-awareness through daily mood tracking, diary writing, and data analysis.
Users can record daily mood states, write diaries, upload multimedia content, and understand their emotional change trends through visual data analysis.
The goal is to provide users with a warm and safe digital space to promote emotional management and psychological healing.
MVP doesn't need login/registration features

call generate_spec
```

### Get Specification Documents

call get_spec

上传, 该怎么做?","rich_text_json_repr":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"我现在需要打包, 上传, 该怎么做?"}]}]},"mentioned_items":[],"structured_output_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":0,"content":"根据你的项目配置，这是一个Python包，需要打包并上传到PyPI。以下是步骤：

## 1. 安装构建工具

```bash
uv add --dev build twine
```

## 2. 构建包

```bash
uv run python -m build
```

这会在 `dist/` 目录下生成 `.tar.gz` 和 `.whl` 文件。

## 3. 上传到PyPI

### 首次上传或测试：
```bash
# 上传到测试PyPI (推荐先测试)
uv run twine upload --repository testpypi dist/*

# 上传到正式PyPI
uv run twine upload dist/*
```

## 4. 配置认证

你需要PyPI账号和API token：

1. 在 [PyPI](https://pypi.org) 注册账号
2. 生成API token
3. 配置认证：

```bash
# 方法1: 使用环境变量
export TWINE_USERNAME=__token__
export TWINE_PASSWORD=your-api-token

# 方法2: 或者在上传时输入
```

## 5. 版本管理

每次上传前记得更新版本号：

<augment_code_snippet path="pyproject.toml" mode="EDIT">
```toml
[project]
name = "mcp-spec"
version = "0.1.5" # 增加版本号
```
</augment_code_snippet>

## 6. 完整流程

```bash
# 1. 更新版本号
# 2. 构建
uv run python -m build

# 3. 检查包
uv run twine check dist/*

# 4. 上传
uv run twine upload dist/*
```

上传成功后，用户就可以通过 `uvx mcp-spec@latest` 使用你的包了。

workflow/简历警察V2.yml:0-882"}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":0,"type":0,"text_node":{"content":"我现在需要打包, 上传, 该怎么做?"}},{"id":1,"type":4,"ide_state_node":{"workspaceFolders":[{"repositoryRoot":"C:/Users/15524/PycharmProjects/SPEC-mcp","folderRoot":"C:/Users/15524/PycharmProjects/SPEC-mcp"}],"workspaceFoldersUnchanged":false}}],"timestamp":"2025-07-29T14:44:58.996Z","response_text":"根据你的项目配置，这是一个Python包，需要打包并上传到PyPI。以下是步骤：

## 1. 安装构建工具

```bash
uv add --dev build twine
```

## 2. 构建包

```bash
uv run python -m build
```

这会在 `dist/` 目录下生成 `.tar.gz` 和 `.whl` 文件。

## 3. 上传到PyPI

### 首次上传或测试：
```bash
# 上传到测试PyPI (推荐先测试)
uv run twine upload --repository testpypi dist/*

# 上传到正式PyPI
uv run twine upload dist/*
```

## 4. 配置认证

你需要PyPI账号和API token：

1. 在 [PyPI](https://pypi.org) 注册账号
2. 生成API token
3. 配置认证：

```bash
# 方法1: 使用环境变量
export TWINE_USERNAME=__token__
export TWINE_PASSWORD=your-api-token

# 方法2: 或者在上传时输入
```

## 5. 版本管理

每次上传前记得更新版本号：

````toml path=pyproject.toml mode=EDIT
[project]
name = "mcp-spec"
version = "0.1.5" # 增加版本号
````

## 6. 完整流程

```bash
# 1. 更新版本号
# 2. 构建
uv run python -m build

# 3. 检查包
uv run twine check dist/*

# 4. 上传
uv run twine upload dist/*
```

上传成功后，用户就可以通过 `uvx mcp-spec@latest` 使用你的包了。
